casebody.data:
S. J. GROVES & SONS COMPANY, PETITIONER, v. THE UNITED STATES [No. 45910] [106 C. Cls. 93;

329 U. S. —]

Government contract; extra costs due to unknown conditions and alleged misrepresentations.

Plaintiff’s petition for writ of certiorari denied by the Supreme Court October 21, 1946.
